info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 5:19PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Saratoga, southwestern Washington and north central Rensselaer Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 519 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mechanicville, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Saratoga Springs, Mechanicville, Round Lake, Country Knolls, Gates, Malta, Easton, Stillwater, Schaghticoke, Valley Falls, Deans Corners, Maltaville, Malta Ridge, Schaghticoke Hill, Coveville, Francis Corners, Hickeys Corners, Johnsonville, Willow Glen and Coons. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 11 and 13N. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
